name: TheAtlantic
text: Over the next four years, the GOP could function primarily as a promotional tool for Trump—to the detriment of the party's future, writes @PeterAtlantic. https://t.co/CHmMKsLZgf

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Like much of what Trump touches, election and voting-rights litigation has now been twisted and distorted in ways that could have lasting negative effects," @kimwehle writes: https://t.co/7Ey8MZGfr9

name: TheAtlantic
text: WarnerMedia’s decision to put all of its 2021 movies on HBO Max is a shortsighted decision that will have major repercussions for Hollywood, @davidlsims argues. https://t.co/tTzevRR0QZ
